page.title: 05Family Life in Codford
page.content: My name is Stacey Rogers and I live at Tethers End, New Road, Codford, Warminster, Wilts. My dad works for the County Council inspecting the roads. He is a Clerk of Works. He works at Trowbridge and leaves home at 7.40am and arrives at work by 8.30am. My mum is a housewife and she also does typing for someone. My brother Stuart is 13 years old and goes to Kingdown School. He catches a school bus every morning at 8.0am. I go to Codford Primary School and leave home every day at 8.40am and get home at 3.20pm. Dad gets home at 6pm and Stuart gets home at 4.35pm. We all have our tea together at about 6pm. We have two dogs which are Cavalier King Charles Spaniels,Bonnie and Cassie. I help mum with baking on Saturdays. On Sundays we watch Dad play cricket. Evenings I watch T.V.or read.
